Explanations about Options.-u:
Unlock the password of the named account. This option re-enables a password by
 changing the password back to its previous value (to the value before using the -l
 option).

Top-3 Scripts:
so_27474402: for PASSWORD in $PASSWORDS
do
    rar t -p"$PASSWORD" spe_05_1.part13.rar
    if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
        echo "Password is '$PASSWORD'"
        break
    fi
done

for file in *.part01.rar; do unrar x -p<password> ${file}; done;
